title: POWERFUL 15 Min Guided Meditation For Stress & Anxiety | Surrender To The Flow
description:
This 15 minute guided meditation will help you cope and process through any stress and anxiety you might be feeling in your life. 
🚨 Check out our NEW youtube channel dedicated EXCLUSIVELY to Meditations 🚨 
https://flow.bohobeautiful.life/BohoBeautifulMind-

 It is the best meditation to help you find peace with the unfolding of your life and recognize that whatever you are dealing with, is only what it is until you give it the label of either good or bad.

This meditation will show you that it is up to you to give yourself the permission to go within and simply surrender to the outcome, to find peace with the moment, and let go of the illusion of control so that you can just sit in stillness with the beauty of your own life experience.

And be content with nothing more than just being.
Good or bad.
Just be.

This Meditation Is Part Of The Boho Beautiful 14 Day Meditation Journey
Sign up & Begin Your FREE 14 Day Yoga & Meditation Journey! 
https://www.bohobeautiful.life/freeyoga

Instructor: Juliana Spicoluk
Video Production: Mark Spicoluk

channelDescription:
Free yoga videos for the digital yogi. 
Specializing in content highlighting fitness, pilates, vegan food, guided meditations and thoughtful blogs for conscious and mindful living. Boho Beautiful is the creation and beating heart of both Juliana and Mark Spicoluk.

If you are new to the Boho Beautiful family, be ready to experience everything from beginner and intermediate to yin, hatha, ashtanga and so much more.


Your Decisions Today Will Define Your Tomorrow.

comments:
We are thrilled to let u beautiful people know we now have 3 options for taking your mediation practice deeper with us… ✨

Our new premium program - all shot in Tibet:
www.bohobeautiful.life/meditation

A free mediation challenge:
https://bohobeautiful.life/freemeditations

Our mediation only YouTube channel:
https://www.youtube.com/@BohoBeautifulMeditation

All our love & light...
Juliana & Mark ☮
My 8 year old son loves your meditation. He meditate every morning and before bed and when school starts getting to hard to handle.
I started crying when you said "Let go, it's okay"...thank you Juliana and Mark for all these wonderful meditations ❤️
The background music is truly a work of god. _

I didn't expect the wave of emotions to hit me. Usually my monkey brain won't still long enough to last thru a full meditation so it was crazy when I was sitting there and I found tears rolling down my face thinking bout things I haven't thought of in years. I guess I have a lot to let go. Maybe that's why mediation intimidates me so much. Its hard letting go of things you've held onto for years. Wow what a video ❤
